name: Dice Goal
description:
This is a classic casual game, with classic gameplay, but combined with brand new gameplay!

All you need to do is click the dice and let the dice be your way forward!

In the game, you are an adventurer, continue to explore, collect items and rewards!
Using strategy wisely and using dice can help you get more rewards! Become the Best one in the game!

How to play?

-Roll the dice to advance
-Get rewards for maps
-Keep Exploring
-Collect more rewards

what are you waiting for?
Wealth and rewards are waiting for you!
Download the game now! Bring you more awards!
